text: Oni prinesli velichayshiye klyatvy imenem Allakha o tom, chto yesli k nim pridet predosteregayushchiy uveshchevatel', to oni vstanut na boleye pravil'nyy put', chem lyubaya drugaya obshchina. Kogda zhe k nim yavilsya predosteregayushchiy uveshchevatel', eto ne uvelichilo v nikh nichego, krome otvrashcheniya
